name: Aerial Predation
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

name: Annihilating Fire
oracle_text: Annihilating Fire deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
"The most impressive performances can be done only once."
—Mote, Rakdos madcap

name: Armory Guard
oracle_text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

name: Auger Spree
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Avenging Arrow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text:
"Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

name: Axebane Guardian
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
flavor_text: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.

name: Axebane Stag
flavor_text:
"When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds."
—Kirce, Axebane guardian

name: Azorius Arrester
oracle_text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
flavor_text: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

name: Azorius Guildgate
oracle_text:
Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: Enter the Senate, the seat of justice and the foundation of Ravnican society.

name: Batterhorn
oracle_text: When Batterhorn enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Novice shopkeeps spend hours deciding how best to display their wares. Veterans focus on portability.

name: Bellows Lizard
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"It is forbidden. Asking why is irrelevant."
—Sergiu, Opal Lake magistrate

name: Catacomb Slug
flavor_text:
"The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Centaur Healer
oracle_text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

name: Centaur's Herald
oracle_text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Centaur's Herald: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
flavor_text: The farther they go from Vitu-Ghazi, the less willing the crowd is to part for them.

name: Chemister's Trick
oracle_text:
Target creature you don't control gets -2/-0 until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

name: Chorus of Might
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
flavor_text:
"In each of us is the strength of all of us."
—Trostani

name: Chronic Flooding
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller mills three cards.
flavor_text: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.

name: Cobblebrute
flavor_text: The most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

name: Common Bond
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: Wolf riders hone their skills traversing the perilous rooftops, each dizzying step bringing elf and wolf closer together.

name: Concordia Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"A kick from its hooves is like a bolt of lightning. I'd know. I've been hit by both."
—Rencz, Izzet chemister's aide

name: Coursers' Accord
oracle_text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: Bleak rumors reached Trostani's ears. She decreed that no one should travel alone.

name: Cremate
oracle_text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Without a body, the soul is helpless to fight the terms of our contracts."
—Somhaur, Orzhov pontiff

name: Crosstown Courier
oracle_text: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player mills that many cards.
flavor_text: Information travels quickly through Ravnica's network of messengers and thought agents.

name: Daggerdrome Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

name: Dead Reveler
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: He's the unlife of the party.

name: Destroy the Evidence
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Everyone knew the Dimir had done the damage. Everyone suspected the Izzet had hired them.

name: Deviant Glee
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{R}: This creature gains trample until end of turn."
flavor_text: "You just need the right incentive to fulfill my dreams."

name: Dispel
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text:
"Civilization will subsume us unless we overwhelm it instead."
—Speaker Zegana

name: Doorkeeper
oracle_text:
Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor_text: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

name: Downsize
oracle_text:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

name: Drainpipe Vermin
oracle_text: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.
flavor_text: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.

name: Dramatic Rescue
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I never thought I'd be so glad to see two tons of beak and claws bearing down on me at the speed of an arrow."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Drudge Beetle
oracle_text: Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.

name: Druid's Deliverance
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

name: Dynacharge
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
flavor_text: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

name: Electrickery
oracle_text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

name: Essence Backlash
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Essence Backlash deals damage equal to that spell's power to its controller.
flavor_text:
"The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

name: Ethereal Armor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.
flavor_text: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.

name: Explosive Impact
oracle_text: Explosive Impact deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Such boorish noise is what passes for subtlety among the Boros."
—Vraska

name: Eyes in the Skies
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text:
"What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."
—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

name: Frostburn Weird
oracle_text: {U/R}: Frostburn Weird gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Many chemisters are oblivious to the innumerable machinations of their guild, instead focusing obsessively on creating the perfect weird.

name: Gatecreeper Vine
oracle_text:
Defender
When Gatecreeper Vine enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or a Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every inch of Ravnica is home to something.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants."
—Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2

name: Goblin Electromancer
oracle_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

name: Golgari Guildgate
oracle_text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavor_text: Enter those who are starving and sick. You are welcome among the Swarm when the rest of Ravnica rejects you.

name: Golgari Longlegs
flavor_text: Despite its enormous stature, it can fold itself into a tunnel with startling quickness, vanishing back into the undercity.

name: Gore-House Chainwalker
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: If the pig's blood drips on you, you're next on the chain.

name: Grim Roustabout
oracle_text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.
flavor_text: He'll point you to your death row seats.

name: Grisly Salvage
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

name: Horncaller's Chant
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text:
"The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?"
—Teysa, to Isperia

name: Hussar Patrol
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Vigilance
flavor_text:
"You think no one is watching, you think you're smart enough to escape, and most foolish of all, you think no one cares."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Inaction Injunction
oracle_text:
Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"To prevent action is to prevent transgression."
—Azorius Arrester motto

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.
flavor_text:
"Day 31: I finally succeeded in my time reversal experiment!
"Day 30: I might have a problem here."
—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

name: Isperia's Skywatch
oracle_text:
Flying
When Isperia's Skywatch enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

name: Izzet Guildgate
oracle_text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavor_text: Enter those with the vision to create and the daring to release their creations.

name: Keening Apparition
oracle_text: Sacrifice Keening Apparition: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

name: Knightly Valor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

name: Korozda Monitor
oracle_text:
Trample
Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Launch Party
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

name: Lobber Crew
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Lobber Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, untap Lobber Crew.
flavor_text: It's easier to just aim at everything.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: With no memories left to compare to his present situation, Andalum was finally content.

name: Mizzium Skin
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

name: Ogre Jailbreaker
oracle_text:
Defender
Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.

name: Paralyzing Grasp
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text:
"Obviously, the Firemind's mission is worth more than a few goblins."
—Pelener, chamberlain of Niv-Mizzet

name: Perilous Shadow
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Perilous Shadow gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There are some shadows that even the Dimir fear.

name: Pursuit of Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{U}: This creature gains flying until end of turn."
flavor_text:
"Watch the voltage. We don't need another charred, crashing viashino."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

name: Rakdos Guildgate
oracle_text:
Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text: Enter and indulge your darkest fantasies, for you may never pass this way again.

name: Rakdos Shred-Freak
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

name: Rootborn Defenses
oracle_text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

name: Rubbleback Rhino
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: The trouble started when a street urchin bet a goblin he could ride one until the clock on Shilbo's Tower struck thirteen.

name: Runewing
oracle_text:
Flying
When Runewing dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: In the hands of the open-minded, a runewing quill writes wisdom of its own.

name: Search Warrant
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You gain life equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
flavor_text: "And would you care to explain why your satchel is radiating an aura of unstable energy?"

name: Selesnya Guildgate
oracle_text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: Enter and rejoice! The Conclave stands united, open to one and all.

name: Selesnya Sentry
oracle_text: {5}{G}: Regenerate Selesnya Sentry.
flavor_text: Ravnicans still tell tales about the Battle of Sumala where four Selesnya sentries held off an entire clan of Gruul warriors.

name: Seller of Songbirds
oracle_text: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
flavor_text:
"Lady Wren is the one merchant in Keyhole Downs who isn't running a scam."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Sewer Shambler
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Scavenge {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Skull Rend
oracle_text: Skull Rend deals 2 damage to each opponent. Those players each discard two cards at random.
flavor_text:
"We could never accept anyone with a face that pretty or a mind that sane."
—Nyoser, Gore-House ringleader

name: Sluiceway Scorpion
oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Scavenge {1}{B}{G} ({1}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Spawn of Rix Maadi
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:
"Straight from the blood-drenched imagination of our illustrious parun!"
—Nyoser, Gore-House ringleader

name: Splatter Thug
oracle_text:
First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

name: Stab Wound
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

name: Stealer of Secrets
oracle_text: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.

name: Stonefare Crocodile
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.

name: Sundering Growth
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text:
"One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."
—Trostani

name: Sunspire Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"For each griffin wounded by an arrow, there's a corpse with a bow nearby."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Survey the Wreckage
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavor_text: Goblins and architects seldom get along.

name: Swift Justice
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.
flavor_text:
"Having conviction is more important than being righteous."
—Aurelia

name: Tenement Crasher
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: Nothing was going to stop it—not the narrow alleys, not the Boros garrison, and certainly not the four-story Orzhov cathedral.

name: Terrus Wurm
oracle_text: Scavenge {6}{B} ({6}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"We follow it through its tunnels, and where it dies, we farm."
—Mihas, spore druid

name: Tower Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
{W}: Tower Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The first motion put forth in the pristine Jelenn Column was for severe restrictions on the airspace around New Prahv.

name: Towering Indrik
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.

name: Trained Caracal
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Some Ravnicans consider carrying a sword to be beneath them, preferring instead a tooth-and-claw escort.

name: Traitorous Instinct
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.
flavor_text: Joining the Worldsoul took years of study and meditation. Severing that connection took the snap of Rakdos's fingers.

name: Transguild Promenade
oracle_text:
Transguild Promenade enters the battlefield tapped.
When Transguild Promenade enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Trestle Troll
oracle_text:
Defender
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{B}{G}: Regenerate Trestle Troll.
flavor_text: Unwelcome in Golgari colonies, he found his own dark place from which to represent the Swarm.

name: Trostani's Judgment
oracle_text: Exile target creature, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
flavor_text:
"Some cannot be saved as they are, but all can serve the Worldsoul."
—Trostani

name: Urban Burgeoning
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."
flavor_text: The ruins of Old Prahv became a wildspace, although all birdsong was silenced by lingering Azorius magic.

name: Vassal Soul
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: For the Azorius, the opportunity to serve the law is too great an honor for death to interrupt.

name: Viashino Racketeer
oracle_text: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: "You may call me a fool, selling this stuff on Orzhov turf. Well, you need to be a little reckless to survive."

name: Voidwielder
oracle_text: When Voidwielder enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"He makes up his own laws, and that's dangerous to all who love peace and prosperity. Kill him on sight."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar
